original_text: Now who is there to harm you if you are zealous for what is good?
korean_text: 또 너희가 열심으로 선을 행하면 누가 너희를 해하리요

sentences.original_text: Now who is there to harm you
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너를 해할 자가 누구 있겠느냐

sentences.original_text: if you are zealous for what is good?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 선한 것을 위해 열심을 내면
